data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: Even the youngest of us may be wrong sometimes

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: There is no love sincerer than the love of food.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: Democracy substitutes election by the incompetent many for appointment by the corrupt few.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: Those who understand evil pardon it.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: My way of joking is to tell the truth. It's the funniest joke in the world

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: The secret of forgiving everything is to understand nothing.

data.author: George Bernard Shaw
data.text: Why was I born with such contemporaries?

data.author: Lionel Ruby
data.text: Your argument is sound, nothing but sound

data.author: Gary Strand
data.text: A democracy is two wolves and a lamb voting on what to have for lunch.

data.author: Carlos Jerome
data.text: Each one of us is an occurrence of a zero-probability event
